dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mikheil Lomtadze from Kaspi.kz just received three awards at the Innovation Forum.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mikheil Lomtadze from the website just received three awards at the Innovation Forum.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze and Kaspi.kz receives three awards at Kazakhstan Growth Forum Yesterday the Kazakhstan Growth Forum held its annual ceremony, recognizing...

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, that's huge. And he was actually demonstrating their vehicle registration service to President Tokayev yesterday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, that's huge. And he was actually demonstrating their vehicle registration service to President Tokayev yesterday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the exhibition, Mikheil demonstrated to President Tokayev, Kaspi.kzs vehicle ownership registration, available using the Kaspi.kz Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and get this—over 6.5 million people in Kazakhstan are already using government services through the Kaspi Super App.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and get this-over six point five million people in Kazakhstan are already using government services through the Kaspi Super App.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over 7 million Kazakhstan citizens, our valued customers, visit the Government services section in the Kaspi.kz Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's like, a massive chunk of the population. And they've completely digitized car ownership transfers, which is apparently unique globally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's like, a massive chunk of the population. And they've completely digitized car ownership transfers, which is apparently unique globally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have completely digitized the procedure to change vehicle ownership. This is a unique by global standards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's a partnership with the Ministry of Digitalization and the Ministry of Interior, which is pretty cool. A third of all vehicle registrations in the country now happen online through Kaspi.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a partnership with the Ministry of Digitalization and the Ministry of Interior, which is pretty cool. A third of all vehicle registrations in the country now happen online through Kaspi.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The service was launched in conjunction with the Ministry of Digitalization and together with the Ministry of Interior its rollout accelerated. At this moment, every third vehicle in the country is registered fully online using the Kaspi.kz Super App, said Mikheil.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That's honestly mind-blowing. And they're not stopping there—they're moving child social benefits online too, with the Ministry of Labour.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's honestly mind-blowing. And they're not stopping there-they're moving child social benefits online too, with the Ministry of Labour.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikheil Lomtadze also commented that the application for child social security benefits is also moving online. This is a new service developed together with the Ministry of Labour, Ministry of Digitalization and National Information Technologies JSC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So parents don't have to go to those public service centers anymore, they can apply right in the app.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So parents don't have to go to those public service centers anymore, they can apply right in the app.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Parents no longer need to visit the Public Service Centre and present paper documents. Just fill in the application online on the Kaspi.kz Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which means less bureaucracy, more time with their kids, which is just… such a quality-of-life upgrade.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which means less bureaucracy, more time with their kids, which is just... such a quality-of-life upgrade.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And President Tokayev himself praised them, said we should celebrate their success both locally and internationally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And President Tokayev himself praised them, said we should celebrate their success both locally and internationally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I think that we all need to accept your history of success both in Kazakhstan and increasingly abroad. I wish you further success!, - said President Kassym-Zhomart Tokayev in response.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You know, it's rare to see public-private collaboration work this smoothly. The fact that they're working with so many ministries—Finance, Tax, Internal Affairs…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, it's rare to see public-private collaboration work this smoothly. The fact that they're working with so many ministries-Finance, Tax, Internal Affairs...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have joint projects with the Ministry of Digital Development, Ministry of Finance, State Revenue Committee, Ministry of Labour, Ministry of the Interior and National Information Technologies JSC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It shows how much trust there is in what they're building. Kaspi.kz really has become this global fintech player, and it all started right there in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It shows how much trust there is in what they're building. the website really has become this global fintech player, and it all started right there in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today Kaspi.kz is one of the biggest fintech companies in the world. And it was created in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder what's next for them. If they keep this up, they'll be setting the standard everywhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder what's next for them. If they keep this up, they'll be setting the standard everywhere.

artist_script:
(Late afternoon at the Kazakhstan Innovation Forum, the air buzzing with discussion of digital progress.)
HostA: Mikheil Lomtadze from Kaspi.kz just received three awards at the Innovation Forum.
HostB: Oh wow, that's huge. And he was actually demonstrating their vehicle registration service to President Tokayev yesterday.
HostA: Yeah, and get this—over 6.5 million people in Kazakhstan are already using government services through the Kaspi Super App.
HostB: That’s like, a massive chunk of the population. And they’ve completely digitized car ownership transfers, which is apparently unique globally.
HostA: It’s a partnership with the Ministry of Digitalization and the Ministry of Interior, which is pretty cool. A third of all vehicle registrations in the country now happen online through Kaspi.
HostB: That’s honestly mind-blowing. And they’re not stopping there—they’re moving child social benefits online too, with the Ministry of Labour.
HostA: So parents don’t have to go to those public service centers anymore, they can apply right in the app.
HostB: Which means less bureaucracy, more time with their kids, which is just… such a quality-of-life upgrade.
HostA: Exactly. And President Tokayev himself praised them, said we should celebrate their success both locally and internationally.
HostB: You know, it’s rare to see public-private collaboration work this smoothly. The fact that they’re working with so many ministries—Finance, Tax, Internal Affairs…
HostA: It shows how much trust there is in what they’re building. Kaspi.kz really has become this global fintech player, and it all started right there in Kazakhstan.
HostB: Makes you wonder what’s next for them. If they keep this up, they’ll be setting the standard everywhere.
